article_title: Rockford's health care surge is the region's big economic story

article_metadata.description: ROCKFORD — Is bigger better? That's the question that looms over the Rockford region's health care sector, which has experienced sweeping growth in recent years.Approximately 29,500 people work in the health care and medical science fields in Winnebago, Boone and McHenry counties, according to the Economic Development District of Northern Illinois. Health care and social assistance jobs account for 14.1 percent of employment in the three-county region.Rockford's major health care
article_metadata.author: Isaac Guerrero
